borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: REAR GARDENT1 Magnolia soulangeana - 20% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by approx. 1-2m to tidy and contain, retaining furnishing growth. Final height = 4m and final spread = 6m.	T2 Cherry (Prunus spp)	- Remove crossing stem growing up through the tree. Reduce remaining tree by approx. 2-3m, back to previous points, to tidy and contain, retaining furnishing growth. Final height = 3m and final spread = 2m.	T3 Apple (Malus domestica) - 20% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by approx. 1-2m to tidy and contain, retaining furnishing growth. Thin out through removal of water shoots. Final height = 4m and final spread = 4m.	T4 Apple (Malus domestica) - 20% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by approx. 1-2m to tidy and contain, retaining furnishing growth. Thin out through removal of water shoots. Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.T5 Plum (Prunus domestica) - 20% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by approx. 1-2m to tidy and contain, retaining furnishing growth. Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.	T7 Crab Apple (Malus sylvestris) - 20% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread of the tree by approx. 1-2m to tidy and contain, retaining furnishing growth. Final height = 4m and final spread = 2m.
